sentences.sContent: Open the checkbook, and protests will stop.
sentences.sContent_eng: Open the checkbook, and protests will stop.
sentences.sCn: 打开支票簿，抗议活动即将停止。

sentences.sContent: Oh, by the way, it will positively impact your checkbook too.
sentences.sContent_eng: Oh, by the way, it will positively impact your checkbook too.
sentences.sCn: 哦，顺便说一下，这对你的支票簿也会产生积极的影响。

sentences.sContent: Teach someone a useful skill – cooking, changing a tire, balancing a checkbook.
sentences.sContent_eng: Teach someone a useful skill – cooking, changing a tire, balancing a checkbook.
sentences.sCn: 教给他人一项有用的技术——例如烹调、拆换轮胎，平衡支票簿。
